paragraphs: I am web developer based in Cape Town, South Africa. I'm currently a student at LifeChoice Academy, where I've been developing my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript & Vue JS. I am passionate about creating visually stunning web experiences that not only look great, but also function seamlessly. In my free time, I enjoy exploring new technology, playing video games and hitting the gym.

services.title: My Skills
services.subtitle: What I am able to use

items.title: Vue3
items.description: Vue.js, a powerful JavaScript framework renowned for its simplicity and efficiency in building interactive and responsive user interfaces for modern web applications.

items.title: HTML
items.description: HTML, the foundational language of the web, which I use to create the structure and layout of websites, ensuring they are accessible, semantically correct, and visually appealing..

items.title: Javascript
items.description: JavaScript, a versatile and powerful programming language that enables me to create dynamic and interactive experiences on the web.

items.title: Bootstrap
items.description: Bootstrap, a popular front-end framework that allows me to create modern and responsive websites with ease.

projects.title: LilMedia
projects.description: , I present a dynamic website that I built using a powerful combination of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. This fully responsive and visually appealing website showcases my ability to create engaging user experiences, leveraging JavaScript for interactivity, HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and Bootstrap for rapid development and seamless responsiveness across devices. Through this project, I demonstrate my proficiency in front-end web development, highlighting my skills in utilizing modern technologies to deliver an aesthetically pleasing and functional website.

projects.title: Javascript Calculator
projects.description: A basic calculator using Html, CSS and Javascript to calculate simple maths.

projects.title: Temperature Convertor Calculator
projects.description: A basic temperature convertor using HTML, CSS and Javascript to convertor Celsius to Fahrenheit

projects.title: Hulu
projects.description: A hulu  clone website using only HTML and CSS

projects.title: Lucid Clothing Store
projects.description: A Landing page clothing store website using HTML, CSS and Javascript to display products

projects.title: To do List
projects.description: A to do list app to do basic add, remove and create tasks using HTML, CSS and Javascript

members.name: Olwethu Bhiya
members.quote: His unwavering commitment to quality and attention to detail are truly remarkable. He consistently produces high-quality work that exceeds expectations, and he never compromises on the standards of excellence. His ability to meet deadlines and handle pressure with ease is a testament to his dedication and determination.

members.name: Ethan Lesar
members.quote: I have had the pleasure of working with Liyabona on a few projects now and I must say, his attention to detail and dedication to producing high-quality work never ceases to amaze me. He has a great eye for design and is always willing to collaborate and share his ideas. His technical skills are impressive and his ability to problem-solve is truly remarkable. I have no doubt that he will make a significant impact in the industry, and I am honored to have worked alongside him.

members.name: Ridhaa Gabier
members.quote: Liyabona is an outstanding colleague, and I feel lucky to have had the opportunity to work with him. His professionalism, work ethic, and team spirit make him an invaluable asset to any organization, and I am confident that he will continue to achieve great things in his future endeavors.

members.name: Zulaigaih Benjamin
members.quote: He is an excellent communicator and team player. He is always willing to go the extra mile to support his colleagues and contribute to the success of our team. He approaches every task with a positive attitude and a willingness to collaborate, and his enthusiasm is contagious.

members.name: Sakhe Mzolisa
members.quote: Liyabona is always positive. He likes to be ahead when doing a project so that he does not need to panic. He manages his time effectively making him the post alert learner.

members.name: Oslin Johnson
members.quote: He puts into effort creating a welcoming and inclusive learning environment. His kindness and compassion towards students is a testament to his character and his commitment to excellence.He is hard worker willing to go the extra mile to ensure that their goal is reached within expected time. He does not let their lack of skill determine them overcoming the challenge.
